projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: My personal website to document projects and learning.

projects.title: Task Tracker App
projects.description: A lightweight task manager for daily productivity.

projects.approach: Used localStorage to persist tasks and JS for logic

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Displays real-time weather using an API.

projects.approach: Fetched data from a public weather API

projects.title: Study Planner
projects.description: Planner to organize study sessions and deadlines.
projects.problem: I struggled with organizing study time

projects.title: Handwriting Converter
projects.description: Converts handwritten text into digital text.
projects.problem: Needed a way to digitize handwritten notes
projects.approach: Used OCR libraries to process images
